content: अनुक्रम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अनुगतः क्रमं] In due order. --मः {@--1@} Succession, order, sequence, arrangement, method, due order; प्रचक्रमे वक्तुमनुक्रमज्ञा <ls>R. 6. 70</ls>; श्वश्रूजनं सर्वमनुक्रमेण <ls n="R.">14. 60</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 41.</ls> {@--2@} A table of contents, index, such as that of the Vedic Saṃhitās.
